name: SEAN!
description:
Try not to have a panic attack after your friend Sean invites you to a park and then fails to show up. Avoid talking to strangers and other unsavory interactions and ignore pestering anxious thoughts in a unfamiliar park.

Use keyboard and mouse to move, or gamepad joysticks.

Made in collaboration with @redmoe, @onyxemperor, and @chellaman.

Only Mac for now,  but more platforms will soon be supported.
